attributes.action: Heavily Regulate Or Ban the use of I.T Recruitment Agencies Please.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It would appear these days that nearly every I.T job, be it "Contract" or "Permanent" seems to be handled by an agency of some description. 

Sometimes one agency will do the "Pre-Screening" for another agency.
creating in effect a "False Market", with no basis at all. 

Quite a lot of agencies create "Fake Jobs", to attract a number of C.V's quickly. 

Some agencies are less than honest. There is no need for I.T Recruitment Agencies at all. 

The bosses hiring the workers should be taught how to assess potential candidates themselves. 

For example the NHS would thousands by recruitng I.T workers themselves rather than Outsourcing to an agency and wasting money.

The money saved could pay a nurses wages. The NHS is only one example.
